      • login

        @PostMapping(value="/login")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> login(@RequestBody
                                                                                      LoggedUser loggedUser,
                                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpSession request)
                                                                               throws CustomValidationExepation,
                                                                                      CustomDateBaseExepation,
                                                                                      CustomLoginExeption

        Login

        this method receives a Logged User instance as a @RequestBody and passes it to each of the servers accordingly. in case the login is successful it will set an attribute on the session using the "LoggedUser" name and the user data as a value.
        Parameters:
        loggedUser - - (LoggedUser)
        request - - (HttpSession)
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity(LoggedUser)(lu ,HttpStatus.OK )
        Throws:
        CustomValidationExepation - -
        CustomDateBaseExepation - -
        CustomLoginExeption - -

      • logOut

        @PostMapping(path="/logOut")
public void logOut(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)

        Log Out

        path = "/logOut" invalidate the session and log out from the server.
        Parameters:
        session - - .
